definition[0]: someone who takes part in a game or sport
definition[1]: one of the important people, companies, countries etc that is involved in and influences a situation, especially one involving competition
example[1]: a firm that is a dominant player on Wall Street
example[2]: a key player in world affairs
definition[2]: someone who plays a musical instrument
definition[3]: a man who has sexual relationships with many different women
definition[5]: one of the important people, companies etc involved in a particular industry, market, situation etc
example[4]: He is one of the major players in the multimedia industry.
example[5]: The company is a world player in telecommunications equipment.
